about.description1: Located at the pristine Mussulo Peninsula, Okwambi Rentals is Luanda's premier destination for water and land adventures. We combine top-quality equipment with professional service to deliver safe, thrilling experiences for adventure seekers of all levels.
about.description2: Every vehicle in our fleet is rigorously maintained and includes comprehensive safety equipment. Our experienced team provides thorough briefings, GPS tracking, and on-site support. Whether you're a first-timer or an experienced rider, we ensure your adventure at Mussulo is unforgettable, safe, and perfectly tailored to your skill level.

faq.description: Everything you need to know about renting with us

questions.q: What documents do I need to rent a vehicle?
questions.a: You'll need a valid driver's license or government-issued ID/passport, and a credit card for the security deposit. If you're 16-17 years old or don't have a driver's license, a parental/guardian consent form is required.

questions.q: What is the minimum age to rent?
questions.a: The minimum age is 16 years old. However, if you're 16-17 or don't have a driver's license, you must provide a signed parental/guardian consent form.
Yes, free cancellation is available up to 24 hours before your booking time. Cancellations within 24 hours are subject to a 50% fee.

questions.q: Is fuel included in the rental price?
questions.a: Yes, all our vehicles come with a full fuel tank included in the rental price.

questions.q: What happens if the vehicle breaks down?
questions.a: All our vehicles are regularly maintained. In the unlikely event of a breakdown, contact us immediately and we'll provide roadside assistance or a replacement vehicle.

questions.q: Can I extend my rental period?
questions.a: Yes, you can extend your rental subject to availability. Please contact us at least 2 hours before your scheduled return time.

questions.q: Are helmets and safety gear provided?
questions.a: Yes, we provide helmets and basic safety gear for all our vehicles at no additional cost.
Basic insurance covers damage to the vehicle and third-party liability. Personal accident insurance is available for an additional fee.
